content.raw:
This is a vast improvement.  I can credibly move the hands and arms near to an object on this surface (I placed the leak detector onto it) and I am able to approach it from a variety of angles, not just one extreme grab point.

I was also able to place the solar array at this height without any trouble.

This is a vast improvement. I can credibly move the hands and arms near to an object on this surface (I placed the leak detector onto it) and I am able to approach it from a variety of angles, not just one extreme grab point.

I was also able to place the solar array at this height without any trouble.
